text:
Message 686 of 4024
?
Sent:01/23/2024 at 01:36 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 02:32 PM)
Subject:Please Call Me
Message 687 of 4024
If you do that it will be devastating to any future employment opportunities. They always ask that.
You took my soulemate, my lover, my kids, and my house. Please don’t take my opportunity to start over.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 01:49 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 02:32 PM)
Subject:Restraining Orde
Message 688 of 4024
I’m there now.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 02:03 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 02:33 PM)
Subject:Please join the call
Message 689 of 4024
You agreed to the restraining order knowing the impacts.
Given the escalation of tone in emails, texts, calls, it was prudent to put in place additional guardrails around communications .
This morning’s email was just another example of an unwanted and disturbing communication that was intended to cause distress and disrupt. It had
nothing to do with kids or other areas we are navigating.
I am hopeful we can focus on moving forward in a constructive manner. OFW will be the tool.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 02:37 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 03:11 PM)
Subject:Re: Restraining Orde
Message 690 of 4024
I am asking to please discuss this before you ruin my life. We had agreed to work together after that email. That gave me the impression that we could
move forward and make progress. So when I saw things getting testy, I asked to stop it. I was doing the right thing.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 03:17 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 03:32 PM)
Subject:Re: Restraining Orde
